name: Submersive
description:
How to Play

Try to dive as deep as you can into the ocean while avoiding the mysterious wild life that inhabit its depths. Diving deeper will cost more air and if you run out, you will be forced to start resurfacing. When resurfacing, a magical trident will appear that you can use to clear any creatures in your way and even harvest their oxygen to allow even deeper ventures.

The deeper you explore, the more dangerous the wild life will become.

Controls
  • Moving Left and Right : "A" and "D" or "<-" and "->"
  • Diving Deeper : Spacebar
  • Aiming Trident : Mouse
  • Throwing Trident : Left Click
Credits

Made using Godot. Sprites were made with GraphicsGale. Sound FX made with sfxr. Check out my twitter too!

Credit to flowehead for the music track "Chops". Check out their soundcloud and youtube channel!
